channel.title: ProxySQL Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in ProxySQL Quickstart on Run production-grade databases easily on Kubernetes

item.title: Load Balance MySQL Group Replication Using ProxySQL
item.description: Load Balance MySQL Group Replication Using ProxySQL ProxySQL supports load balancing for MySQL Group Replication. This guide will show you how you can load balance MySQL Group Replication using ProxySQL. Before You Begin Before proceeding: Read mysql group replication concept to learn about MySQL Group Replication. You need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using kind.
